amendment.description: Amendment redirects $10 million from the Operation and Maintenance Account, Defense-Wide to the Office of Economic Adjustment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to redirect funds within the Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide account by $10,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Ellison.
